project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design and implement a Python-based quiz game that presents multiple-choice questions to the user, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end.

task.name: Define the structure for storing questions and answers
Implement the logic for asking questions and receiving user input
Display the final score to the user at the end of the quiz
Write tests for the question asking and score tracking functionalities
Execute tests on the implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
